website_summaries.verdict: Seems to work quickly on ear odor problems, eliminating redness by removing dirt and other irritants.
pros: Doesn't have harsh chemicals, steroids, or antibiotics to make it safe to use regularly
Works equally well on wax buildup and ear redness
Many pets will show improvement in less than a week with this cleaner
cons: Costs a little more than some others
Some pets may show skin irritation after use

website_summaries.verdict: Made with only 9 healing ingredients, this natural formula makes your pet's ears uninhabitable for fungus, bacteria, mites, and other organisms that cause ear problems.
pros: Can be used to clear up infections or prevent ear problems
A natural formula that's free from antibiotics, steroids, harsh chemicals and other questionable ingredients
Many see significant results in 2 days or less, although can take 10 days to totally clear
cons: Does not come with a dropper for dispensing
May make dog's ears and fur sticky

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing and works fast
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my dog had a really bad ear infection. Ordered eco ears- received it on a Tuesday and by Friday this is what my dogs ears looked like. I couldn’t pour the solution into the ears Bc it was too painful. So I soaked a cotton round and put it under the ear flap and massaged for as long as he would let me. (2x a day) I will continue to use it for the next few days to make sure all the infection is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only received this last wednesday.....on day 5. I am just speechless!!!! The results are unbelievable!!!!!! I have had to clean my Old English Sheepdog's ear EVERYDAY for the last 3 years....EVERY.DAY!!!! On day 5, my dog's ear looks so amazing! I have tried EVERYTHING!!!!! First picture day 1, second picture day 5!!!!!!!!! 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Riss Dan

customer_reviews.title: Don't use this!
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this product if it had worked. There is alcohol in it and burns my dogs ears like no other! I will be returning this! No dog ear cleaner should have any alcohol in it, especially for something like this where you are putting it in/on an infected, inflamed, irritated area. If I could give zero stars I would. I was so excited to use this product and all I did was make my dogs ears worse she hates this stuff and all she does now is scratch her ears, whine, etc. Will be returning asap. Please don't use this!
customer_reviews.author: Tacy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: So far this ear cleaner is amazing. We are on day 2 and can already ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this ear cleaner is amazing. We are on day 2 and can already see a huge difference. Our 9 year old GSD has never had a problem with his ears until about 2 weeks ago: smelly, gunky and gross. The cleaner does have a strong smell but our dog doesn’t mind it and it’s better than smelly ears! We use it outside (it’s winter right now but he has enough fur to stay warm!) so he can shake his head when the time is up without making a mess. Gave 4 stars because we are only 2 days in, will update at the end of the recommended 10 day treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Burned dogs ears and left permanent scars
customer_reviews.text: Burned my dogs ears and now he is terrified of anything liquid. I thought he just didn’t like it but after a few days his ears had open wounds on them and bleeding from this stuff and was in horrible pain. Now he has permanent scars. Also he had big bumps on the inside of his ears that looked painful. Maybe he was just allergic to it. I don’t recommend for sensitive dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: No pain, great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: So, my dog and I have been battling an ear infection since January. It’s become chronic . I’v tried changing his food,keeping his ears dry, we’ve tried the wax from the vet, antibiotics, and ear washes. This has been the best working so far, it’s kept the yeast at bay but has not cured the problem despite going through an entire bottle. I’v used this everyday and was a little weary as some reviewers mentioned that it burned their dogs ears. I have a poodle/golden with old man ears that I keep trimmed but not plucked and so far this beats what the vet has presecribed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not for fur baby
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy this worked for so many. However, It did not work for my fur Baby . It burned her ear and made it red. I kept thinking if I do it for a couple of more day, it will work. I threw the stuff away on day 3. I couldn't do it to her anymore and I couldn't stand the smell. Has anyone tried to put it in their ear? I found another product that worked better for my dog and doesn't smell or burn. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has an ongoing problem with ear infections and we have tried everything. Vet meds are expensive and haven’t worked for her. After yet another ear infection I read on Facebook about this product and ordered some. We only used it a few times and her ears look the best they have ever looked and she isn’t scratching them anymore. She had been scratching until they would bleed. They are pretty and pink and clean. This also isn’t the oily mess that a lot of ear meds are. Very pleased and our dog is much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Prince Raynor

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Results! All natural is what drew me in, it works is what has me writing a review. Day 5 and both my dogs show a huge improvement! I wear disposable gloves while treating because the smell is pretty strong if it gets on your skin. Not bad, just strong. Have a few paper towels handy. Be sure to give a treat after to hopefully make the next treatment go smoothly. Defenatly recommend! I’m so happy I didn’t have to resort to using pesticides in my fur babies ears!
customer_reviews.author: Tee W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even help with a minor ear infection
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets ear infections pretty regularly. He’s used to having his ears cleaned and usually doesn’t mind it. Not with this stuff... he hates this one!!! I followed the directions and a day after his treatment was done I realized the infection was still there. This wasn’t even a bad ear infection. With all of the ear cleaners I have used over the years for my dogs and fosters, this is by far the worst I’ve used. I regret wasting my money on this because of all of the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. I read up on different types of knine ear fungus and infections to find what types needed antibiotics or just a treatment. The type my beagle/Boxer mix had a fungus due to damp weather conditions. I have uesd this, EcoEars, consistent and the redsults have been a daily improvement. His ear is now fungus free and I'm estatic about this product and emphatically recommend it to any anamial (fur baby) parent.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as promised
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as promised. My Golden still has chronic ear infections. I was hoping that after the vet packed his ears with antibiotics that I would be able to use this product as a maintenance to keep the infection away, but no, after 2 weeks the ear was once again infected. If someone has a better product that works, I would love to know
customer_reviews.author: Johanne Saichek

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!
customer_reviews.text: Always a skeptic, i ordered this because of recurring yeast infections in my pup's ears. I was interested in a natural remedy, so after reading the reviews i ordered it and it came earlier than expected, which was awesome. Following the instructions, i was pleased to see marked improvement within two days! i will continue the suggested regimen and hope to see no more problems. During my research, i also talked to my pet store which has all natural foods and they had done some research on yeast infection problems. it seems there is a connection between starch in the diet and the yeast. i am now trying to limit starch in my Buddies food(who knew?)
customer_reviews.author: Jan M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, safe ingredients, reasonable cost, fast delivery, excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: I have done everything to relieve my 2 y/o Golden’s itchy and very “smelly “ ears. We ran the usual allergy tests, changed her diet, baked her treats, cortisone, Benadryl,, etc, etc. We gave her only 2 doses on the cleanser as directed (just once a day); smell is gone, ears are much less red, reduced the brownish discharge. It truly is incredible. I know this sounds as if we had stock in the company, I can assure you we don’t. We are thrilled we had just about given up. I am going to continue for the suggested 10 day period, will keep you posted!
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I am shook. This stuff is a miracle. I have a golden retriever and a Goldendoodle. Both had ear infections and we got the prescription cleaner and treatment from the vet. 10 days and their ears were not much better. I ordered this more as preventative, but one treatment and their ears cleared up and the flapping stopped. This was about a week after the meds not working so I went back to the vet to check and their both fine. I’ve been using once a month and we’ve had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Hmlmama

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing 4 days into a 10-day treatment and her ear ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. It wasn't going to work. My dog has had this ear infection allergy her entire life. We've tried everything we could think of every prescription every home remedy everything we could find. This wasn't going to work.... Well comma I'm man enough to admit when I was wrong. This stuff is amazing 4 days into a 10-day treatment and her ear infection is gone! She feels better, doesn't scratch, doesn't stink...she's actually for the first time in her 4 years enjoying running and playing without stopping and shaking or scratching until she whines. Get this product! Pay whatever they're charging! I have never seen my baby girl so damn happy to just be a normal dog!
customer_reviews.author: Chris F Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: My senior mini dachshund developed an unpleasant smell in her ears and she'd itch them constantly. I presumed a yeast infection, but after two different vets "couldn't find anything" when they looked at her ears, I figured this stuff was worth a shot. I'm so glad I tried it! In just days my pups symptoms completely resolved. I still use them 1-2x/wk for maintenance, but what a difference these have made. I highly recommend them to anyone whose pet has "mystery" ear trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah North

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Started working almost immediately. And while everyones reviews seem to complain about the smell, it smells just like tea tree oil.. which is exactly what it’s supposed to smell like. And if you don’t mind the smell of tea tree oil then you’ll be fine. It actually works really well. We had been battling ear mites for awhile and this seemed to knock t out fairly quickly. The only annoyance for us was having to do it twice a day, our dog did not like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well first off the smell is a bit strong like menthol or something but It does work well for my dog. He's a pit bull and prone to ear infections. I've tried a lot of other things and this was suggested to try before using prescription antibiotics. My boys ears cleared up in a few days and i clean his ears weekly now. Also i had a rabbit with an ear infection of some sort and it cleared her mess up fast too.
customer_reviews.author: kyle burke

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but knew your product had 4.5 star rating and numerous satisfied customers. I don't have the ability to lay each dog on his side and hold him down to pour the Ecoears into his/her ears, but I am able to take the doggie size q-tips, dipp them into the Ecoears, and clean my dogs ears fairly easily. I have one female that was experiencing yeast infection in her ears. Ecoears, along with the physician's medication, has worked wonders to clean up her ears. I have two other dogs that are also getting their ears treated with Ecoears now. It is saving me from further vet visits. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cocker Mom 3

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ear infection cure!
customer_reviews.text: One of my year and a half old cockapoos had an ear infection pretty much for the entire time I had her since 8 weeks. Tried everything but the constant itching, ear flakiness, smelly discharges and bright red irritation remained. Other medicines would seem to work for a couple days but her symptoms always returned. In desperation I turned to Amazon and found this. I read the reviews and one person said this product is a miracle. Well believe it. I waited a long time to write this review. It’s been months now and Luna is ear infection free since almost immediately after using this product. Major thank you from Luna!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: It's also useful for cleaning around the inner ear
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy, Cheddar, swam for the first time and ended up with really red ears the day after. Assuming it would turn into a full-blown infection, we ordered EcoEars and started treating it immediately. After just one application, the redness went away and, as a result, she stopped itching her ears and shaking her head. We use this as a preventative now, immediately applying after her baths and swim sessions. It's also useful for cleaning around the inner ear. We pour some on a washcloth and clean around her inner ear about once a week. Our only complaint is that the scent is quite strong, and it lingers long after use.
customer_reviews.author: caileigh

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Do not let the price fool you! This stuff WORKS! My poor Labrador retriever had the worst ears (they smelled, he constantly itched them, etc) and as soon as we started using EcoEars regularly, he forgot about his ears! It was a crazy change!!! So happy to see him happy!! PROS: -It works!! -Works fairly quickly -My dog was a new dog after using -Doesn’t have a bad smell (I just wouldn’t be up for smelling it 25/8) CONS: -Like giving any dog medicine, my dog hates having it first put in his ears! (It’s a typical thing, though!)
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: EcoEars Works
customer_reviews.text: Like many first-time product purchases on Amazon, you read a sampling of the reviews for some insight but really you are on your own to order and try it out. Ecoears was recommended to me by my neighbor that she uses on her Cocker Spaniel. I was looking for something for my Wheaten Terrier to clean some occasional discharge from his ears. Used as directed, I cleaned his ear each night for about a week until it was clear, then no more discharge. I use it now about once a week as a preventive and no more discharge. On a recent visit to my Vet, they told me that my dog's ears look great. EcoEars works.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ear cleaner keeps my dogs’ ears mite and infection free, smells great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this ear cleaner. I have three Portuguese Water Dogs, who love to jump in any body of water, be it puddles, ponds or creeks. Their ears have flaps and hair in the openings and so they are prone to ear infections and ear mites. I use this cleaner once a week and while my dogs may not be thrilled, it keeps their ears clean and smelling fresh. It is easy to use and even helped clear up an infection better than an ear wash prescribed by a vet. This is the third bottle I have purchased. Definitely makes my life as a dog mom much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be painful :(
customer_reviews.text: The product might work but it seems to hurt my dog. He is the post passive dog I have ever been around. We can pretty much do anything and even if he doesn't like it he will just go along. This product is the only thing I have ever seen him actually try and get away from. We have to literally hold him down while he struggles to get away. After a couple days, I quit trying. If he is fighting that hard, it must be incredibly painful.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbity Bobbity Boo

customer_reviews.title: Not for super sensitive ears
customer_reviews.text: My basset hound has super sensitive ears and they need to be monitored often for infections. When I heard about this product, I was excited, thinking there was finally something that would help her. I used it twice and both times she ended up getting a worse problem than before I put it in her ears. She went from having a little dirt in her ears to having a full on infection both times I used it. I can't use it on her anymore. If your dog has super sensitive ears, I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This works in 24 hours! Can’t believe it!
customer_reviews.text: My poor cocker spainel kept getting bad ear infections, nothing worked from the vet. We She had black goo in her ears - smelled awful! Spent over $200 on vet prescribed products. Bought this not expecting much, I tried it in her ears and in 24 hours the magic happened and her ears starting clearing - 5 days later it was gone and her infections have not come back months later. Stuff does smell. She didn’t like the first day of treatment - was very pouty around the house, the next day she was back to herself and didn’t mind the treatment. I have a happy little dog now with no smelly ears!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Top came loose!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product as it came highly recommended from a friend along with ZYMOX. We figured we would try this initially as we have a big boy that's had problems with his ears since he was a puppy and nothing was working...However, upon arrival, was disappointed to see that somehow the cap must have come loose in transport and a quarter of the bottle was gone:( We've used the product now for about 3 days and hope to see continuous improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: The great reviews are telling the truth, this is a miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This ear cleaner has saved my doggy lots of itchy ears scratching. It smells strong, but not intolerable. Once it's in her ear and I'm massaging it around for the minute, she LOVES it. She even looks forward to it now because it bring her such relief. I can't believe I finally found something like this that is affordable and that truly helps my doggy, instead of having to pay an insane amount to get it done by the groomer or vet. GET THIS EAR CLEANER FOR YOUR DOG! It is the best product I have found on Amazon that I have bought for my pup. You're pup will be grateful you did!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: You need to fill ear canal with liquid
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby won't hold still while I pour the liquid into her ear. I would prefer an oil that I could hand warm and put small drops into her ear, and massage into ear canal. I don't know if something like that exists for dogs. I think she would tolerate it better. This is only my belief. This product may work VERY well if I could get into her ear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Results in just a few days!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I been having issues with my dog's ears for a few months now and try a different medication but didn't do much. His ears were dry and some parts was bleeding, lots of ear wax discharge. I been using this item for 5 days and you can see a big difference. I'm so happy that my dog no longer has an ear infection. I took him to the vet yesterday and they said his ears look wonderful and smell great. He still has minor bacteria on one ear but she told me to continue using this product. I will continue using this product to help prevent any future infections. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only ear wash that works for us
customer_reviews.text: Our lab has chronic ear infections that have been a thorn in our side for the past 4 years. After a Hematoma in each ear, resulting in two corrective surgeries ($$$), we have finally found a product that is effective. Most of the other products that we tried were slightly useful in cleaning/disinfecting the ears, but irritated them to the point of obvious discomfort. This one is natural, gentle, and most importantly, effective. A bit pricey, but this is the product we will be using for preventing and treating ear infections from now on.
customer_reviews.author: medwa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this stuff to work. I have four dogs. Two of which are cocker spaniels who have frequent ear infections. I followed the directions religiously. I even ordered a second bottle to continue the treatment a second and third time. Yeah, the smell was gone...but it was because all you could smell was this product. No reduction in inflammation or infection. Both dogs have since been to the vet and are now on REAL medicine. More than very disappointed. This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Wade

customer_reviews.title: We have two Great Danes and one had an ear infection about 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two Great Danes and one had an ear infection about 2 years ago when we rescued her but our boy never has. Then we noticed that our boy was shaking his ears and it seemed to come on overnight. I purchased your product to try because he gets very stressed at the vet's office. Within 3 days of using this product and then the ear wipes he is all better. He is not happy about the liquid in his ears but he does like the gentle massage of the ear wipes. Thank you for saving a stressful for all of us!

The vet said the only other option was a little surgery to clean the ear $$$. We have used this product for about 4 days and It seem's like it might just work it seem's to be helping him better than all the other junk we have tried stay tuned only time will tell.

Our poor pups run when they see the bottle because they don’t like the feel of water in their ears.

customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie keeps getting ear infections and the prescription hasn’t cleared it completely. there has been such a strong odor coming from his ears that just wouldn’t go away. I decided to try this out. The first time I think I put too much in his ears because when he got up, it was dripping from his nose. I have used it once a week with only a few drops, rub it in and then let him shake. Each time we notice a visible difference in the gunk build up and the smell dissipates. Now it’s just used for maintenance to keep his ears clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs ABV

customer_reviews.text: I have a Goldendoodle, she was on antibiotics for several weeks had developed a bad yeast infection in her ear. It is easily recognized by the smell and crustiness around the ear. I tried a couple of dog ear washes but the infection raged on. I gave this a try out of desperation and WOW, so pleased with the results. After a week it's almost completely cleared up. It truly works and I will be keeping this on hand for any future problems.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: Best ear cleaner for dogs with sensitive ears!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through bottles of this stuff with my French bulldog who is prone to ear infections and ear gunk. It works so well and keeps his ears so clean - I don’t even have to go in there with Q-tips anymore. He doesn’t enjoy the application so I saturate a cotton ball and put that in his ear and rub it around. He tolerates it much better that way. The scent is strong but pleasant; it has grown on me after so much use. It’s a bit pricy for the amount you get but worth it.

customer_reviews.text: I spent probably thousands going to the vet because our Lhasa was constantly getting ear infections. customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.text: smells like essential oils not medicine, seems very natural. our hound dogs gets ear infections (shaking head, hot, red, smelly ears) I poured a little in his ears and rubbed them as well has put some on a cotton ball and wiped out his ears twice daily, within a couple days of using he was shaking his head less and less and the odor was going away. did not seem to sting him or cause discomfort.

customer_reviews.text: After YEARS OF battling ear infections in my spaniel--yeast, staph, MRSA, I tried this product. At first, I applied it twice a day, then went to once a day. Finally! customer_reviews.text: Love this ear cleaner! It is by far the best solution for yeast build up and ear infections. AMAZING PRODUCT; I WILL DEFINITELY BUY AGAIN!

customer_reviews.text: "No Vet needed" my dog has been dealing with a ear infection for almost 2 years I've tried all kinds of remedies and products that guarantee Improvement. customer_reviews.title: Works well for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend too much for ear cleaner but after I found out you are not supposed to use rubbing alcohol or peroxide I was willing to try something else. This product works well and our dog doesn't seem to mind it. I will purchase again if it continues to work. Our dog is family so if we have to spend some money to keep him well then so be it.
customer_reviews.author: David Macphee

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Helps Molly's frequent ear infections, thus saving us trips to the Vet. If I actually used the amount prescribed, I would go through like a bottle every two weeks, so we cut back. But it's still easier on the animal & cheaper for me. My only complaint, and it's a small one, is that the "herbal-mediciney" scent of the product is quite strong, and actually keeps me awake if the dog sleeps on my bed. Most likely, the tea-tree smell is the medicinal part and it's what's actually helping her ear infections, if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: aimee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on yeast
customer_reviews.text: This products was suggested to me but did not work on my dog. It was like putting water in his ear. After 2 weeks and nothing changing, I took him back to the vet. Because it was so thin, I think as much went on the floor as did in his ear. Being that it is a natural product, depending on what is going on with your pet, it might be worth a try. I did not as for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a bernedoodle. This is the only war was that completely cleared up his stinky ears. I would get the prescription from the vet and that would clear it up for a few days. But it always came back. This keeps his ears squeaky clean no infections. The smell is a lot!!!!!! And it will last a few days. Sometimes will shake his head for about an hour after the treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Ammari

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my black Labradors infected ears. Her ears were so bad that she would hide when I first started using the product. After 4 days of 2 times a day use my dog would allow me to do her ears because they were feeling better!! She no longer hid from me and came willingly and pushed her ears back to allow me to put the ear cleaner on her!!!! This product really works!! I put it on cotton balls, then put those in her ears and then rubbed the product in.
customer_reviews.author: labslovepandas

customer_reviews.title: Really works fast!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as it says! My dogs picked up ear mites from the neighbors dog and after treating with mineral oil for a month and not getting full results on 1 of my dogs, he wound up with an ear infection from the mites, I found this on FB as an add no less. Well it works perfectly! I used it with an eye dropper and cotton balls for a week and my dogs ears have been clean for a month now! I now use this for regular cleanings. Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Giacomozzi

customer_reviews.title: All natural wash and it works!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup has suffered from red, gooey ear infections since her was a pup. For 2 years I’ve tried different types of ear washes but nothing seemed to work except this. Instead of cleaning everyday to no avail, I now only clean his ear once a week. This wash works and it’s all natural!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had started with this product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few products for my dog’s irritated, gunky ears. I don’t know if previous products actually beat the (probably yeast infection) before I tried this, but this has really cleared out her ears. They look the best they’ve looked in months!!! She’s definitely not itching them and the redness is gone. Smells nice and clean, like tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! My poor puppy had so many health problems when we first got him that he was at the vet like every other day. When his ears started filling with brown goop, most likely as a secondary infection from the antibiotics, I wanted to try something more natural to solve the problem. The top picture shows how bad his ear was even AFTER removing all of the stuff seen on the q-tips. The bottom picture is his ear less than a week later! I'm so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Carcar300

customer_reviews.title: Will burn your dogs ears and He will hate you if you use this product
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't smell pleasant. My dog had a horrible reaction to it. His ear (I only did one ear) got extremley read rather quickly and he yowled in pain.He was afraid of me for the rest of the night and i had to coax him to let me sooth his ear. This stuff is poison. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This worked beautifully for my two labs even though they absolutely hate it. They tend to get ear infections from swimming or even in the winter time. They were in pain and had brown/smelly discharge until we tried this. Just make sure you clean the ears and not just put the product in. For us, the smell was gone after three days and the discharge was fully cleaned by the seventh day. I’m writing this a week after stopping the treatment and the infection is not back.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese has had a yucky itchy ear since he was 2. He’s 9 now. The vet has prescribed me meds and nothing has worked. I got my Ecoears 3 days ago, I kid you not I’ve used tried and my babies ear is white again!
customer_reviews.author: KLDavis

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle lasted me a while, I cleaned my small Pomeranians ears with this twice a day. For about a month. The odor from his ears were gone after just two days of using this product. Not only did the odor disappear but the gunk also went away. It’s important to clean your animals body parts the way you would clean yours maybe not with the same products but when you clean your ears after a shower you should clean you furry buddies also to keep them healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Some, but no all
customer_reviews.text: Our Irish Setter seems to have had a constant ear infection for 3 years now, and we have tried everything from prescribed meds to "natural" relievers, and everything in between with no cure or relief. So my expectations of this product was null. After a problem with the order, we finally received it and I started using it right away. After administering as per instructions, the shaking of the head, and constant digging in his ears has lessened. It has NOT gone away completely. But like I said, with everything we've tried, nothing has worked thus far, this not working completely is no surprise. That is the reason for the 3 stars. But we appreciate that it calmed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Gerber

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Throw away everything else this is all you need for your pets ears. I use this on my dogs and cat. One of My dogs swims everyday and her ears get smelly and infected. The vet suggested I remove ear hair and buy prescription solution. My dog does not like me messing with her ears. This is easy to use and we never have an infection or smell. I now use once or twice a week and her ears are always clean and small great.
customer_reviews.author: rhapsody in red

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to know, but optimistic
customer_reviews.text: I use tea tree oil myself so the scent doesn’t bother me as much as others have. I’ve only been using for a couple of days so my review is only that my dog has chronic ear infections and generally runs when he sees my with any type of bottle in my hand. He has been allowing me to apply the product. A lot of gunk is coming out so I am hopeful that after the 10 consecutive days we will be good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This works like magic for my rott's ear. She is allergic to poultry and often steals food from the other dog's meal with instant allergy/scratching and irritating and crying/whining. One drop in both ears twice daily and in less than three days she is completely normal again. I bought Eco ears twice already in the past year and will continue using it for my rott. Excellent product that I strongly recommend and very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Gopaul Marajh

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was better than expected! I’d tried everything including home remedy/essential oil things. Nothing had worked for my pit/Aussie puppy’s nasty, black gunky ears! But using this stuff as directed, there was major improvement within a few days. And after the 10 days or whatever it recommends, the gunk was GONE! I’m writing this review like a year later & we’ve never had any more trouble with his ears!
customer_reviews.author: Babynurse

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cleaning and soothing dog ears!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for cleaning my bassett hounds gross ears. It helps to calm down the swelling and pain in his ears and cleans them out. I love the fresh rosemary smell of it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for ear infections
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed! I was skeptical of this product working as I have already tried 3 different types of highly recommended antibacterial ear cleaner that did not work. My mixed-hound had a nasty ear infection, after using this for just 3 days all the bumps, redness and wax are gone! Gave the smell 2 stars simply because it doesn’t smell good but it definitely doesn’t smell nearly as bad as other antibacterial dog shampoos
customer_reviews.author: Panusacuba

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It took a long while for me to get around to writing this review. This product did NOT work for my dog’s ears - it made them worse and more irritated. I even slightly diluted the cotton and put some product on it and it still irritated his ears. It’s too late to send it back but after all the hype, I’m super disappointed about this product. I have 2 stars because it’s supposedly all natural. And NO, my dog isnt allergic to any of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lysa D.

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My boxer has always had issues with his ears. His ears would get so hot, he would shake his head and scratch his ears to point of bleeding. I've tried everything!!! Products from the vet worked temporarily, but this is the only thing that has ever really worked long term. And it smells better than the other products I've used. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible, dog hated it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old yellow labrador retriever who suffers from chronic ear infections. I was looking for an alternative solution rather than using ear drops prescribed by our vet and found this product which has pretty good reviews. I used this only once on my dog who absolutely hated it, the scent is overbearing (tea tree) and I felt horrible doing this to him. After the treatment he went outside and rubbed his head on the ground for a good 10 minutes and then smelt like the product for days. I have to say I did see improvement with just one use but it was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save the Vet Bill for something major!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of Eco Ears I have purchased seeing rave reviews from aMastiff breeder. I have 300lbs of canine and growing- 4 floppy ears make black gunk inevitable. Eco Ears is a marvelous and effective solution. Do they hate it? Yes. Does it work? Yes. Would I rather a $20 bill or $120? OK you got it...
customer_reviews.author: Pet Waitress

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my dogs yeast ear infection
customer_reviews.text: Nothing was working to cure my dogs yeast ear infection. After using 3 different prescription ear drops from my vet and many months, nothing was working. I bought ecoears and used as instructed. After 10 days the infection was almost gone so i continued another 10 days. No more infection! I could have saved hundreds of dollars i spent on ear cultures, vet visits and prescriptions if i tried ecoears first!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working...
customer_reviews.text: Just started my dog's 5th day, and she SEEMS to be feeling better. She's NOT thrilled at all when I put it in, and she's a bit hard to keep still (lab/pit mix).... but, she's beginning to realize it doesn't hurt, it's just cold. It's easy to dispense from the bottle. I don't care for the smell, but it might just be me. My husband doesn't think it smells bad at all. But, the object is to get my furbaby well, so the smell isn't a big deal. I really hope it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been having problems with her left ear for years now and we have tried so many different products and none have seemed to work! So far we are on day three of using this stuff and the results are amazing! She hasn't been shaking her head or scratching at her ear! She sleeps all night! Definitely would recommend this! Also it has a nice smell to it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My shichi was having some foul smelling odor coming from his ears and he was constantly shaking his head. I feared he had an ear infection or at the very least, they were clogged up with wax. Rather than an expensive vet visit I thought I would give this a try first. A few applications of this as directed and he was feeling better in just 2 days and the odor was gone! He didn't exactly like it since he's pretty hyperactive and defensive, but I can tell he's much happier now that the irritation is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful using this product
customer_reviews.text: My four year old lab has had issues with his ears, like a lot of floppy ear dogs do. I bought this thinking I would use it to flush his ears and correct any infections before they began. I noticed his right ear having issues after beginning treatment. I took him to his vet and he has developed an ulcer in his inner ear that was bleeding due to this stuff. I immediately threw it out. Be very careful when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - Worth Every Penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite skeptical about purchasing this item. Our dog kept shaking his head and we’re told he had ear mites. I treated the mites over and over without improvement. I used this product several times the first week and was shocked that during each cleaning, there was less and less buildup. I’m now using this faithfully every 10-14 days and am pleased with the outcome. No more shaking his head, whining or hot, red ears. I highly recommend this product for dog owners. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: THRIFTYMOM

customer_reviews.title: Best product we’ve come across!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff definitely works! Our Doxie has always had 1 bad ear, but after using this product her ear infection has been drastically reduced and I find that her ears stay cleaner much longer. I used this on her everytime she gets a bath because the smell is not the greatest and I don’t like it to linger on her coat, so during bath time is when she gets pampered and cleaned...
customer_reviews.author: NLC

customer_reviews.title: Best ear cleansing product for dogs I've purchased yet
customer_reviews.text: Best ear cleansing product for dogs I've purchased yet! Would absolutely purchase again. My boxer/hound battles ear infections frequently and causes her to dig in her ears all the time making the situation worse! She would shake her head all the time. After the first few times using this-no more digging or head shaking! Couldn't be happier! I did purchase a soft cone for her for the first couple of days so she wouldn't be able to dig in her ear and to promote healing. She wasn't too happy about it but the combo worked and she is happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dogs developed blisters, swelling and a large amount of yucky drainage- still really smelly . Had to get antibiotics and prescription for ears from vet . Just not right for my dog
customer_reviews.author: Teresa l Kruft

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews but like many others on here spent thousands on Meds and vets and many trips to vet.Very much a skeptic I tried eco ears wow with in 3 -4 days ears are drying up and my pup is much happier and no more black seeping gunk and the terrible smell is gone .If your dog has problem ears this stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! Will forever buy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years for my beagle who has reoccurring yeast in his ear... he got into a swamp years ago and nothing the vets prescribe ever worked until this. It takes two weeks to get it cleared up with this product and I maintain about once every couple weeks and now it only flairs up a couple times a year rather than every other month! It smells gross though
customer_reviews.author: Lara McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Have been battling ear infection for a couple of months, with vet medications and cleaners. Found this on Amazon, organic and great reviews, so thought I would try it. It looks like it is removing the crustiness that has been on my "little girl's" outer ears. Fingers crossed that it is going to be a success.
customer_reviews.author: Shelvie J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: God Send
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every product recommended and/or prescribed by numerous veterinarians throughout the last 20 years. Nothing has slightly helped any of my Great Pyrenees. This product is a God send! My 11 year old girl is finally getting some relief! No more stinky redish brown gunk coming out of her ears. She still has some sticky discharge. It is much better smelling and a light earwax color. The head shaking is also at a minamal! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Your health is such a delicate situation with your animals. This works. For 30 years I have made my own ear medicine but the smell and the eye droppers and so forth fruit the animals out with this medicine you can just doctor them clean their ears and move forward. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: goddesshall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely STELLAR!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Female German shepherd, from the day we got her, she has had yeast/stinky ear problems. I've tried everything including the vet. Some worked better than others, but not one has relieved her of the problems completely. After using this product her ears aren't smelling anymore, she's not constantly shaking her head, and or scratching constantly. She's just a happy dog. I highly recommend this product, you won't be disappointed. The only reason I gave 4 stars on product smell is because it's pungent, but it works amazingly well!!!
customer_reviews.author: hghnrg

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Ear is what it should be named!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product I've used on my floppy eared beagles for at least a decade. I am a beagle lover and pedigree breeder I can attest this stuff works and is cheaper than a vet. My vet is the one who turned me to it after numerous challenges with my 15 year old beagle and I've used it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Cre8ive One

customer_reviews.title: Works great for floppy-eared dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs with floppy ears always seem to be prone to ear issues. This works great as a cleaner and when there is any type of infection brewing. I like that I'm not pouring goodness knows what into my dog's ears. Highly recommend for dogs that are prone to ear issues. Really good product.
customer_reviews.author: taarfa

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve taken before pics
customer_reviews.text: After seeing a blog about this product, I bought it because my floppy-eared dog is constantly getting red, irritated ears. The vet always costs extra because he turns into the Incredible Hulk and has to be sedated to be treated. His ears went from red to normal after about 5 days!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Dog's ears are worse after using product.
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't even ask for her usual treat this morning after using this product last night. Her ear looks very inflamed. She cries softly when I put my hand on her ear. So sad for her. Please think twice before putting the alcohol or tea tree that is in this product, in your dog's ears.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud51297

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Beagle mix with itchy, sore inner ears. Vet prescribed anti inflammatory/anti itch meds. Ears cleared until meds were finished, then terrible condition resumed. Searched Amazon, and liked reviews for EcoEars. I was concerned about one comment regarding this product causing pain at first. This is exactly what happened. She ran, shook her head, rubbed ears in the grass, and avoided me when she thought I'd try to use it again. But after 3 days of this difficult dance, her ears are 90% better! I believe it still hurts a bit when I use the product, but I will continue with it. Results are worth it. Strong but pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Not offensive to my dog
customer_reviews.text: Milo normally runs away when he sees the cotton squares being moistened, but with this product, he sits and seems to even enjoy getting his ears cleaned. He has always had a bad ear problem with dirt, fungus, and mites, so this is great that we can clean his ears without any struggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome natural stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product really works my two teacup yorkies had a foul smell in their ears and were always trying what it felt like trying to scratch their ears off. This product has eliminated the smell completely they itch a whole lot less and the icky brown build up in their ears is almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: another satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my dog for 10 days as recommended for his mild ear infection. Unfortunately, his condition has not improved and the product didn't seem to help. It has a pleasant smell but that's all I noticed. I'll be taking him to the vet instead. I would like a refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Wazir

customer_reviews.title: No more nasty stinky ears!
customer_reviews.text: I am here to tell every dog owner who has struggled with a dog who has chronic, stinky yeast infections in their ears. This product is amazing!! Our Golden Retriever is almost nine years old and ever since we have had him his ears would get gunk in them and smell nasty. He was miserable and was always shaking his head. Poor guy. A trip to the vet and a lot of money spent for a temporary fix. Do not hesitate to try this product. You will not be disappointed! I did NOT receive any compensation for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl from California

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Not going to post a picture because... eww but this stuff works. It takes away all the gross funky dirt / blood / gunk in the dogs ears. It really works wonders. Our dog gets gross ear infections that smell and irritate him. He shakes and scratches at it until he hurts himself. One application of this and his ear looks clean without any actual cleaning by us.
customer_reviews.author: JennyLynn22

customer_reviews.title: Cleans out the funk!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived quickly and it even included a stopper to prevent the liquid from spilling while in transit. Has a clean pine sol smell but, this thing sure does work. Day #1 I applied to a cotton ball and took out all the discharge from my dogs ears. She hates them but, did I mention it already works? I am already on Day #2 and her ears are already at 70% infection free but, I will continue to use for the recommended 10 days. Found this while looking for “How to clean my dogs ears” on Pinterest read the mom blog and now I’m here! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Roque Torres

product_meta.title: Vet Organics Dog Ear Cleaner. Natural Multi-Symptom Formula. for Itch, Head Shaking, Discharge & Smell. Naturally Cleanses Away Common Problems. 100% Guaranteed | EcoEars
feature_bullets: 💗 #1 MULTI-SYMPTOM DOG EAR CLEANER - Treats Itch, smell, and gunk. Helps restore dogs' ears to healthy condition in 7-10 days. Unlike prescription dog ear infection medicine, EcoEars clears the ear problems fast and leaves the ears fresh and clean. Just fill the ear canal and gently massage base of your dog's ear.

💗 ALL NATURAL | MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR DOGS - Includes no pharmaceuticals, synthetic chemicals, hydrocortisone (steroids), solvents or antibiotics. Great for sensitive ears! Choose our high-quality cleaner to help with your dog ear infections. If you see signs of dirt, irritation, itching, bad odor or discharge, EcoEars can help.

💗 TOP-RATED PRODUCT - EcoEars washes away pathogens, grime and most other common invaders in dog's ears. Our natural dog ear cleaner also helps to eliminate wax buildup, inflammation and redness. If you include EcoEars in your weekly grooming routine, and after water activities, you will help keep your dog’s ears safe and healthy.

💗 QUICKLY STOPS THE SMELL, HEAD-SHAKING, ITCH & DISCHARGE - Restores your dog's ears to their natural healthy state. Helps break down wax, dirt, crust and biofilms that may have accumulated in your dogs ears and flushes away any remaining parasites.
💗 100% NO-HASSLE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE! - This applies to all Vet Organics products for one full year from the date of purchase.
